title: My items keep on LINKING THEM SELVES
body:
Everytime i enter match, my items keep spamming the chat like i am linking them.

Obviously, it's kind of hard to link an item in the middle of a teamfight, or even while typing.

I unplugged my mouse and keyboard, to no success. Just constant spamming of every item i have. 

I'm afraid if i play any more matches i'll get punished or banned for "Spamming chat"..... I am doing nothing.... The items are literally linking THEM SELVES even in the middle of team fights, even while typing. 

It makes no sense AT ALL.

FIX THIS BUG.

replies.body:
Yikes thats uh.....unique problem for sure. I'm guessing this is most likely happening due to some messed up keybindings or *possibly* some corrupted game files, so let's be sure to hit both of those. Run a quick repair through the game client, and follow the steps below for a config reset. Let me know in a reply if this doesn't help though!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

I don't have any special bindings or anything, i use the default bindings along with quick cast, and that's about it. But i did do what you said JUUUUUST in case it wants to happen again.

I had this same problem during my last game on Summoners Rift.. Reconnecting to the game also did not help. I noticed the (bug)? after I was trying to move my champion to a location and it wasn't going to the location and instead my items started declaring themselves. It seemed to think the mouse was clicking 2 things at the same time or something. It persisted throughout the game, the problem seemed to have resolved itself when i checked in a custom game. Should there be a bug report for this?
